faqs.title_en: What is the purpose of your organization?
faqs.body_en: Our organization focuses on providing high-quality services to our clients.
faqs.body_uz: Bizning tashkilotimiz mijozlarimizga yuqori sifatli xizmatlarni taqdim etishga qaratilgan.

faqs.body_en: You can get involved by volunteering or donating to our cause.
faqs.body_uz: Siz bizning tashabbusimizga ko'ngillilik yoki mablag' yig'ish orqali ishtirok etishingiz mumkin.
